review: I had to wait for an hour last my appointment time, while people who came much after me were sent in. Even after consultation, there is a wait for the examination, and then to speak to the doctor again. *** ****** ****** ********** *** *** *** ******** ******* *** ****** Will not be going here again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The doctor patiently listened to our queries and accordingly advised medicines. Also she suggested for one ultrasound. I am waiting to visit again with ultrasound report. I am waiting for the next step prescription from the doctor. Overall as of now the experience was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My husband and I would like to thank dr. Usha for the guidance and the care with which she handled my pregnancy . For someone who is paranoid about hospital and doctors , she made me feel so comfortable and enjoy the entire process . At every stage she explained the progress of my pregnancy and pushed me to exercise , eat healthy and do what it takes to facilitate normal delivery . Thanks to her guidance I delivered a baby boy in September .

Dr Usha is very friendly, she listens to all ur queries and answers them. I had a very large fibroid and i was treated by her. She performed laproscopic myomectomy, and successfully removed my large fibroid, while many doctors told me that i might have to undergo open surgery, Dr Usha ensured me that she would perform laproscopic surgery. Its been 7 days post op and i have had no issues, no bleeding, no major pain, i am healing well. So my experience with her has been really good. I would highly recommend her ðŸ˜Š

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: it was a worth visiting the doctor, ease of communication between doctor and us was the most important thing that made us more comfortable to explain our concerns and understand doctors suggestions.
Every thing was good except very long waiting time. My appointment was at 2:00 PM  but my turn came only around 3:30 and then again waiting for some time of 15 mins in between.
Doctor might be good but respect others time. Have been there multiple times but everytime waiting has been more than an hour

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explained me properly what was the issue and was very friendly towards me. During follow up check up also my issue was addressed thorughly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly doctor listens to our health issue patiently n clearly explains .. gives ****** treatment for the problem....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wasn't informed about the etiology, nature, prognosis of my condition. I had to repeatedly ask and would receive a one-worded response. I expected better and a more meaningful interaction with the doctor. It was a rather anxiety-provoking experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Usha is an Wonderful human being and an excellent doctor!!!Handled my wife's pregnancy very professionally and with great care.Could not have asked for a better person than  Dr Usha to handle our pregnancy and delivery.Thank you Doctor.Nandini n Venkatesh

context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: Not well treated  went to doctor but staff didn't turn up till 1 hour asked them that I will leave as I had emergency
She was a little distracted and was more occupied with other patients. Would not recommend her to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: she is very good in giving all details and handling emotions of the patients. have very kind approach to the patients..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Amazing doctor and human being. She promotes natural delivery and prepares the patients towards it. She makes the process of maternal care so simple and memorable.
She was really awesome.. the medicine she gave worked awsomely well.. i was getting repetitive infection.. after her medication everything got cured so nicely. Thanks to the doctor..
